description: A component that displays card of any vendor that can be used as a form of payment.

displayEmblem.description: Display Backbase logo on the card.

displayOverlay.description: Display card overlay in the card Defaults to false

imageSrc.description: configuration to pass a link or (base64, svg) image to be used as the background image of the card Defaults to undefined

overlayIcon.description: Overlay icon to be displayed on the card Possible values: 'access-time', 'lock', 'not-interested', 'remove-circle-outline', 'warning' Defaults to undefined

overlayText.description: Overlay status to be displayed on the card Defaults to undefined

paymentCardNumberFormat.description: Configuration of how the card number should be formatted. Defaults to the following format: Example :{ length: 16, maskRange: [0, 12], segments: 4, }

size.description: Defines the size of the card. Small cards show no content Defaults to 'md'
